author: gabriel-rmrz
body:
#### PR description:

It fixes the ranges and binning of several histograms in different modules of phase2 tracker DQM modules. It also fixes the axis titles of several histograms.

#### PR validation:

Checks done with workflow 23234.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
NA
title: Tracker DQM: Phase2 module binning and range updates
